Name: Season to Taste
Description: Spice the next action you play today twice.

Name: Slice and Dice
Description: Deal 2 damage divided as you choose between one or more enemies.

Name: Fill the Pot
Description:
Deal 2 damage.
If this action was spiced, recover 3 vitality.

Name: Toss the Dough
Description:
Deal 2 Damage.
Rotate a card on your field.

Name: Into the Oven
Description: Deal 4 damage. If this damage is dealt to an elite enemy, deal 8 damage instead.
